title: Rum Shrub Recipe
full_text:
Rum Shrub Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
dark rum
1/2
ounce
shrub syrup
3
ounces
club soda
or
seltzer
Directions
Fill a tall glass with ice. Add rum, shrub syrup, and soda. Stir gently to mix and serve immediately.
This Recipe Appears In
Cocktail 101: How to Make Shrub Syrups
